DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Intimacy Enhancement Intervention Couples Facing Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: 1 . Female 2 . Age > 21 year 3 . Has diagnosis nonrecurrent stage IIII breast cancer 4 . Completed active treatment ( e.g. , chemotherapy , radiation therapy , surgery ) 6 months5 year ago ( current use endocrine therapy acceptable ) 5 . Has partner spouse > 21 6 . Lives romantic partner > 6 month 7 . Score > 3 Patient Care Monitor Sexual Concerns screen item 8 . No hearing impairment patient partner 1 . Not able speak English , state medical record observe study team member 2 . ECOG Performance score > 2 OR ill participate judge physician/in medical record 3 . Overt cognitive dysfunction psychiatric disturbance suicidal ideation severe mental illness , observe judge researcher , refer source , qualify observer . 4 . Past history cancer nonmelanoma skin cancer 5 . Currently participate couple/marital therapy 6 . Currently pregnant
